title.content-text: 5.1.1 - Network Layer - Communication from Host to Host

brief.content-text:
The animation depicts the O S I model with the Network Layer highlighted and lists Network Layer protocols as follows:
- Internet Protocol version 4 (IPv4)
- Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6)
- Novell Internetwork Packet Exchange (IPX)
- AppleTalk
- Connectionless Network Service (CLNS, DECnet)
